MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA11 postcode area of Irvine. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.30pm. This is to safely carry out repair work to an underground cable fault at Birskcairn place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:54am on Wednesday, 09 December 2020
